title: SOUND OFF WITH THE KOMETS - OCT. 12
text:
SOUND OFF WITH THE KOMETS - OCT. 12 
By DONOVAN KLEIN October 12, 2015 Updated Oct 12, 2015 at 8:24 PM EDT 
FORT WAYNE, IND. (21ALIVE) - THE PREMIERE OF THIS SEASON'S SOUND OFF WITH THE KOMETS IS LIVE FROM THE SPORTONE/PARKVIEW ICEHOUSE WITH 21ALIVES' TOMMY SHOEGLER. 
KOMET'S COACH GARY GRAHAM JOINS TOMMY AT THE ICEHOUSE TO TALK ABOUT THE KOMET'S UPCOMING SEASON BEGINNING FRIDAY, OCTOBER 16. SPECIAL GUEST HOST CARTER IS ON THE SHOW THIS WEEK AND CHALLENGES COACH GRAHAM IN A MUST-SEE DANCE OFF.
